* The Deadline class encapsulates a type of task to be done.
* A Deadline task is a task that needs to be done before a specific time/date.
* Returns a string representation of the Deadline task.
* @return A string representation of the task.
* The Event class encapsulates a type of task to be done.
* A Deadline task is a task that starts at a specific time and ends at a specific time.
* Returns a string representation of the Event task.
* @return A string representation of the task.
* The Task class encapsulates a task.
* A task has a string description describing the task to be done, and a boolean indicator to represent
* the status of completion of the task.
* Returns an icon representing the state of completion of the task.
* @return A checkmark icon (âœ“) if the task is done, and " " otherwise
* Returns a string representation of the task.
* @return A string representation of the task
* The ToDo class encapsulates a type of task to be done.
* A ToDo task is a task without any date/time attached to it.
* Returns a string representation of the ToDo task.
* @return A string representation of the task.
